creator: carnold@apache.org
text:
Changes to LoggingEvent may break compatibility with Chainsaw or other apps that are dependent on 
the serialized form.  These tests should detect changes in the serialized form resulting from changes in 
LoggingEvent and other classes.

In addition, the bug adds a CoreTestSuite to tests/build.xml which can serve as a home for class-level 
tests without requiring each test to have a corresponding entry in tests/build.xml.

See http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?t=111359016700002&r=1&w=2 (topic "to-do 
list", initial posting 15 April 2005) for discussion on the motivation for writing these tests.
